content: Aug 14 Apparel and footwear maker VF Corp said it would buy  Williamson-Dickie Mfg. Co  the owner of Dickies and Workrite workwear  for about $820 million in cash.

title: VF Corp to buy Dickies workwear maker for $820 million

content: Aug 14 Apparel and footwear maker VF Corp said on Monday it would buy  privately held Williamson-Dickie Mfg. Co  the owner of Dickies and Workrite workwear  for about $820 million in cash.
name: VF Corporation
title: UPDATE 2-VF Corp to buy Dickies workwear maker for $820 million

content: NEW YORK  Feb 27 (Thomson Reuters Foundation) - Apparel giant VF Corp  the company behind such popular brands as Wrangler jeans and Timberland boots  is adopting sourcing policies to eliminate products that contribute to deforestation and human rights violations  it said on Monday.
name: VF Corporation
title: Apparel titan VF Corp tackles deforestation  human rights issues in supply chain

content: LOS ANGELES Former Olympic athlete and reality TV star Bruce Jenner  who is transitioning to life as a woman  revealed her new name as Caitlyn Jenner on Monday and posed in a white strapless leotard on the cover of Vanity Fair magazine. | Video
name: VF Corporation
title: Jenner reveals new name Caitlyn  breaks Twitter record

content: LOS ANGELES Privately held Conde Nast may best be known as the publisher of fashion  culture and lifestyle magazines such as Vogue  Vanity Fair and GQ  but it is hoping to draw new consumers and advertisers through the realm of virtual reality.
name: VF Corporation
title: Conde Nast eyes digital viewers with virtual reality  scripted shows
